replies.body:
@build_high: I'll discuss it with the other Senior Staff.

@bmbrocks321: My rank transfer will probably be permanent, as I would like to choose teams on my alternate account. (To catch some rule breakers etc). We'll see what the future holds!

Again, this probably wasn't thought out in great detail on Ivy's behalf. We rarely get rank transfers, so... that's probably why xD
